title: What are the monuments built by the British? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are more than 100 monuments by British people in India during British India . Some of the monuments are - Parliament of India , New DelhiVictoria terminus , BombayRaj Bhavan , KolkataChennai High CourtIndia Gate, New DelhiGateway of India , Bombay
GatWay of India (Mumbai), Parliament House (Delhi), Rashtrapati Bhavan (Delhi), Fort Willium (Kolkata), St. James Church(Delhi), Victoria Memorial (Kolkata) etc.
